First of all , thanks for the torrent and for the great speed I got here.

Second of all, if you can't get the game running. Remember that you need to unrar the ONE file that you get when downloading it. Right click it and chose extract here (You need Winrar installed) .

Then you will get a new folder with CD1 & CD2 , Mount CD1 with poweriso/daemon tools etc and start the installation. Then the installer will ask you for CD2, then simply mount CD2 now instead of CD1 and hit ok and the installation will continue :) Enjoy!
